openjsip.registrar

Class Registrar

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RegistrarInterface, java.lang.Runnable

        The maximum allowed time for binding to expire

      • standaloneMode

        private static boolean standaloneMode
        Operation mode ( standalone or viaproxy ) Standalone means that Registrar listening network interfaces for incoming REGISTER requests. ViaProxy means that Proxy listening for requests and forwards REGISTER requests to Registrar via RMI. In the last case, SipStack, SipProviders, etc are not used.

      • authenticationEnabled

        private boolean authenticationEnabled
        Flag that enables or disables subscriber's authentication

      • snmpAssistant

      • SNMP_ROOT_OID

        protected static final java.lang.String SNMP_ROOT_OID
        SNMP root oid. This is where all our objects reside. The current value corresponds to .iso.org.dod.internet.private.enterprises. 1937 is our random generated value for (OpenJSIP), but normally this number is to be given by IANA. The next value correspond to: 1 - OpenJSIP Location service 2 - OpenJSIP Registrar service 3 - OpenJSIP Proxy service
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • processRequest

        public Response processRequest(Request request,
                      java.lang.String domain)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RegistrarInterface
        Processes REGISTER requests
        Specified by:
        processRequest in interface RegistrarInterface
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        domain - If set, registrar will use this value instead that one in request itself. This is used when request contains IP address instead of domain name.
        Returns:
        Response to REGISTER request
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        See Also:
        RegistrarInterface

      • processRegister

        private Response processRegister(Request request,
                       java.lang.String correctDomain)
                          throws java.text.ParseException,
                                 java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                 InvalidArgumentException
        This function actually performs registration process.
        Parameters:
        request - Original REGISTER request
        correctDomain - If not null, host part of To header value will be replaced with this correctDomain
        Returns:
        Response to be sent back to client.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - JAIN-SIP internal errors.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Error communicating with location service.
        InvalidArgumentException - JAIN-SIP internal errors.

        public boolean checkAuthorization(Request request,
                         DigestServerAuthenticationMethod dsam,
                         LocationServiceInterface locationService)
                           throws UserNotFoundException,
                                  java.rmi.RemoteException
        Permors subscriber's authentication
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        dsam - DigestServerAuthenticationMethod class
        locationService - Location service instance
        Returns:
        true if subscriber was successfully authorized, false otherwise
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If subscriber was not found in location service database
        java.rmi.RemoteException - ...
